Detailed Description

A class that performs all the callbacks to the c++ layer without any storage specific logic.

: for an implementation that utilizes these callbacks see KeyVaultWindows.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

◆ KeyVaultNative()

IonicSecurity::SDK::KeyVaultNative::KeyVaultNative ( ISKeyVaultInterface *  pKeyVault)

Constructor that takes in a c++ ISKeyVaultInterface class that we wrap.

Parameters
pKeyVault- native keyvault implementaion this class will wrap

Member Function Documentation

◆ cleanVaultStore()

void IonicSecurity::SDK::KeyVaultNative::cleanVaultStore ( )
overridevirtual

Delete the current key vault storage (file, keychain, whatever).

If the loadAllKeyRecords function fails, it may mean something is wrong or corrupt in the file itself. When this happens, the sync function will early out and the key vault can never repair itself. This function is designed to do that by simply deleting the corrupt storage.

Implements IonicSecurity::SDK::KeyVaultInterface.

◆ clearAllKeys()

void IonicSecurity::SDK::KeyVaultNative::clearAllKeys ( )

Exceptions

Exceptions

◆ getAllKeyIds()

array< String^> IonicSecurity::SDK::KeyVaultNative::getAllKeyIds ( )
overridevirtual

Get all key vault ids.

Wrapper for getKeyVaultIds that marshals key ids from an unmanaged std::set to a managed array.

Returns
returns a list of key vault key ids if there is no exception.
Exceptions
convertsError code to an exception if the c++ sdk getAllKeyIds does not return a ISKEYVAULT_OK error code

Implements IonicSecurity::SDK::KeyVaultInterface.
